base,

Maxima 
> > and said "What're the suggested strategies regarding the facts?"
> >

> 
> "Concerning Blackstorm?" Still in her damaged state, in the middle 
of 
> repairs. "1... this base is still vulnerable. 2, Rodimus has lost 
far too many times 
> those he has cared about to stay calm. 3. His vengence for you. 4. 
Blackstorm 
> can still be a pawn.. a tool.. of great use to us. The both of 
us.. bonded 
> upon a level of equality.. like a sisterhood. I still see her as 
great use to 
> us."
> 
> She rested int he CR. "If I am wrong, then I will not continue 
with the 
> subject further." She had nearly forgotten about the dull burning 
from the Matrix 
> within her. Whatever pain was shooting through her, she ignored it.
